Accelerator Design Description¶

The Accelerator Design Description (ADD) is a data model developed to capture the accelerator design independant of file format and/or simulation tool. It is used as intermediate data strucuture when converting between formats or generating lattice files for use with various simulation tools.

Element¶

The base class is Element

class physutil.add.elem.BaseElement(length, diameter, desc='')¶

BaseElement is the base for the ADD class heirarchy.

class physutil.add.elem.NamedElement(length, diameter, name, desc='')¶

NamedElement represents a named accelerator component.

class physutil.add.elem.Element(length, diameter, name, desc='', system='', subsystem='', device='', dtype='')¶

Element represents an accelerator component with a standard name based on system, subsystem, device and instance.
